name: Yade M'rak
Lore: 'Corellian gambler with an addiction to Podrace betting. Has lost most of his belongings to Gardulla. Still operates as a smuggler of black market weaponry.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per turn, may take a just drawn race destiny into hand. Once during a battle Yade is in at a system may use 2 Force to draw destiny. If destiny is odd, add one battle destiny; if even, destiny into hand.',
